answer:
In general, people who have cancer are considered to be at high-risk for serious illness from influenza (the flu) and should get the inactivated influenza (flu) vaccine. However, the type of treatment your husband will receive may affect the timing of when he should get the vaccine.  It is recommended that your husband speaks with his health care provider about getting vaccinated. 
Immunization Nurse
